title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic AI: The Next Frontier of Cloud Intelligence (AIM342)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 智能体 AI：云智能的下一个前沿 (AIM342)
abstract: Agentic AI represents a major evolution in artificial intelligence—where autonomous agents move beyond task execution to intelligent orchestration. On AWS, this paradigm shift is powered by services like Amazon Bedrock, SageMaker, Lambda, and Step Functions, enabling AI agents to reason, plan, and act in dynamic business environments. These agents can self-adapt, collaborate, and stay in sync with real-time enterprise data. From software development to customer service, Agentic AI accelerates outcomes with minimal human intervention. We will discuss how AWS provides the foundational building blocks to scale autonomous decision-making across workflows, unlocking a new era of cloud-native intelligence This presentation is brought to you by Atos, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 智能体 AI 代表了人工智能的重大演进——自主智能体从任务执行发展到智能编排。在 AWS 上，这种范式转变由 Amazon Bedrock、SageMaker、Lambda 和 Step Functions 等服务提供支持，使 AI 智能体能够在动态业务环境中进行推理、规划和行动。这些智能体可以自我适应、协作，并与实时企业数据保持同步。从软件开发到客户服务，智能体 AI 以最少的人工干预加速成果实现。我们将讨论 AWS 如何提供基础构建模块来扩展跨工作流的自主决策制定，开启云原生智能的新时代。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Atos 为您呈现。

presenter.name: Brian Ray
presenter.title: Head of Data and AI, N.A.
